name: Abra

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety. LV. 10 #63

strengths: Low retreat cost of 1 Colorless energy allows for easy switching
Psyshock can potentially paralyze opponents with a coin flip, buying time to evolve
Only requires 1 Psychic energy to attack, making it energy-efficient
Evolves into the powerful Alakazam line
weaknesses: Extremely low HP of 30 makes it vulnerable to being knocked out in one hit
Psyshock's paralysis effect is unreliable (50% chance)
Limited offensive capability with only 10 damage
synergies: Defender to reduce damage and increase survivability
PlusPower to increase Psyshock damage output
Pokemon Breeder to skip Kadabra and evolve directly to Alakazam
Switch or Scoop Up can save Abra from dangerous situations
counters: Fighting-type Pokemon that can exploit low HP
Fast attackers that can knockout before evolution
Gust of Wind to force Abra active from bench
